ygData.subject: Re: Gnomish Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: ...   ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Thousands of Stores.  Millions of Products.  All in one place. Yahoo!
ygData.messageBody:
--- silverminer1@... wrote:
> Just my two cents worth about tinkering Gnomish Fireworks -- I have
> created them and could not wait to try them out and see this wonderful
> display of bursting colors. I nervously double clicked the fireworks
> (pressed f9 to get the best view) and phffff a little tiny poof of what
> i think it was color -- it was so damn quick and small i couldn't make
> out what had happened -- Verant come on geeze what would it take to make
> it at least look a little bit like fireworks. when you cast a spell you
> have beautiful colors and displays and then there is what you give the
> Gnome tinkering. dont give us a skill and make us look stupid by not
> having it do anything.
>
>
> Gnorm / level 34 / Cleric / Bristlebane
>
<HR>
<html>
>
